headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Romero Hearse, Mammoth Patriot
content:
If you’re looking to make a serious first impression, silently cruising up in a hearse is tough to beat. Until now, the only way to make that kind of entrance was to beg, borrow or steal – but now you can buy your very own corpse-transport from Southern San Andreas Super Autos.

And while you’re there, why not pick up another recent addition to the icons of San Andreas range – the Mammoth Patriot – and check out some of its brutal new mod options.
